availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Granville married Martha Ray on October 14, 1830. He was a farmer in Mercer County who owned 12 slaves in 1850.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Dr Granville C Alfred (unknown-May 27, 1873),” Mem #69894033, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Alfred&GSfn=Granville&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=69894033&df=all& (accessed June 4, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, District 1, p. 102; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, not stated, p. unknown; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000191852, Mercer County Marriages, p. 1.
